title: d5 support LFT that is good fun (don't care for rank - will play bronze)
body: Bored on holidays, chuck me an invite on archjuggler if you wanna start something up

replies.body: Cool! Do you have Teamspeak dude? And I'll say now, two of the members are good friends of mine and I can vouch for them that they're great players but so far the other members are randoms and I've so far only played a few normals with them.

Ye, I got Teamspeak, and as I said just wanna have a good time, and play with a new team. Dont want to deal with ragers though :P
Sure your friends will be great
I'll add you sometime tonight or tomorrow dude :-)
awesome thanks :P good to play most nights
